item.title: These cooking oil stocks are surging, as Trump-China trade tensions heat up
item.description: Shares of Bunge and Archer-Daniels-Midland rallied, after President Trump said America didn’t need to buy cooking oil from China, and can ‘easily prod...

item.title: Dollar Tree’s new earnings growth outlook gives investors a reason to cheer
item.description: Dollar Tree sees a light at the end of the tunnel for tariff-mitigation costs, which should lead to accelerated earnings growth.

item.title: I’m 77. Despite my $1.4 million wealth, my expenses exceed my income. Do I sell stocks to pay off my mortgage?
item.description: “I started my own tax-preparation and representation firm. My annual revenue is $60,000 before taxes.”

item.title: Amazon’s stock comeback hinges on AWS hitting this magic number. Why analysts are cautious.
item.description: Amazon’s AWS business likely needs to achieve 20% growth to excite Wall Street, but analysts see increased competition as a key hurdle.
